job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of developing predictive models for a specific business problem (ad suitability).

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions 'predictive models' for identifying likely converters/clickers, a classic ML task.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: Another clear instance of building predictive models based on content consumption for user profiling.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This describes data processing and integration within a big data environment, fitting data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: Building data pipelines and monitoring systems is a key data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en onderhoudt ook data pipelines & werkt mee aan onze web applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence covers both data pipeline maintenance (1.B.3) and working on web applications, which falls under general software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: You build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, â€¦)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions DevOps practices like infra-as-code and CI/CD, which are core to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of model development: analysis, experimentation, implementation, and presentation of results.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines (python, PySpark, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Airflow,..)
job_tasks.justification: This details the construction of data stacks and pipelines using specific technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions building an ML Ops platform, a key MLOps task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of services with other teams, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Indien gewenst, bouw je mee aan onze web-applicaties (voor interne & externe gebruikers) die onze data-producten ontsluiten
job_tasks.justification: This indicates contributing to web applications that expose data products, a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates working within a scrum team, implying collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in agile ceremonies highlights collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to dev and business teams is a clear communication task.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states taking ownership and accountability, which falls under innovation and ownership.
Coaching others is a strong indicator of communication and collaboration skills.
Rolling out best practices implies communication and influencing others.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for user behavior and content suitability. While it mentions MLOps and data pipelines, there is no mention of Generative AI specific tasks like LLMs, RAG, or prompt engineering. The role involves building and integrating these ML models into applications and managing their lifecycle, fitting the 'Core ML Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the types of models being built (predictive) and the technologies used. The responsibilities are well-defined and directly map to traditional ML engineering tasks, making the classification straightforward.
